# source

**Instance Property**

The source view controller for the segue.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var source: UIViewController { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the view controller whose contents are displayed at the beginning of the segue.

## Accessing the segue attributes

- **destination**: The destination view controller for the segue.
- **identifier**: The identifier for the segue object.
